blocks.content_html:
Navigation

Unreal Engine C++ API Reference > Runtime > Engine

References

   
Module Engine
Header /Engine/Source/Runtime/Engine/Public/ShowFlags.h
Include #include "ShowFlags.h"

Syntax

struct FEngineShowFlags

Remarks

ShowFlags are a set of bits (some are fixed in SHIPPING) that are stored in the ViewFamily. They can be used by the artist/designer/developer to debug/profile parts of the rendering. Some ShowFlags are used to customize the rendering e.g. by the SceneCaptureActor, those should not be locked in shipping and not used in inner loops (for performance) They should not be used for scalability (as some might be compiled out for SHIPPING), there we use console variables. ViewModes are on a higher level, they can manipulate show flags before they get used.

Variables

  Type Name Description
bool ActorColoration Render objects with colors based on what the actors coloring handlers provides
bool AmbientCubemap E.g. Ambient cube map, for now SHOWFLAG_ALWAYS_ACCESSIBLE because it's exposed in SceneCapture
bool AmbientOcclusion Screen Space Ambient Occlusion, for now SHOWFLAG_ALWAYS_ACCESSIBLE because it's exposed in SceneCapture
bool AntiAliasing Any Anti-aliasing e.g. FXAA, Temporal AA, for now SHOWFLAG_ALWAYS_ACCESSIBLE because it's exposed in SceneCapture
bool Atmosphere Render Sky and Atmospheric lighting, for now SHOWFLAG_ALWAYS_ACCESSIBLE because it's exposed in SceneCapture
bool AudioRadius Draw sound actor radii
bool BillboardSprites Draw billboard components
bool Bloom Bloom, for now SHOWFLAG_ALWAYS_ACCESSIBLE because it's exposed in SceneCapture
bool Bones Draw the bones of all skeletal meshes
bool Bounds  
bool Brushes Show editor (wireframe) brushes, for now SHOWFLAG_ALWAYS_ACCESSIBLE because it's exposed in SceneCapture
bool BSP Draws BSP brushes (in game or editor textured triangles usually with lightmaps), for now SHOWFLAG_ALWAYS_ACCESSIBLE because it's exposed in SceneCapture
bool BSPSplit Colors BSP based on model component association
bool BSPTriangles Needed for VMI_BrushWireframe and VMI_LitLightmapDensity, Draws BSP triangles
bool BuilderBrush If the builder brush (editor) is getting rendered
bool CameraAspectRatioBars Render safe frames bars
bool CameraFrustums Draws camera frustums
bool CameraImperfections Like bloom dirt mask
bool CameraInterpolation Usually set in game or when previewing cinematics but not in editor, used for motion blur or any kind of rendering features that rely on the former frame
bool Cameras If false, camera's are not shown in the viewport (but are enabled and available for use).
bool CameraSafeFrames Render safe frames
bool CapsuleShadows If Capsule shadows are enabled.
bool Cloud Render Cloud, for now SHOWFLAG_ALWAYS_ACCESSIBLE because it's exposed in SceneCapture
bool Collision Collision drawing
bool CollisionPawn Collision blocking pawn against simple collision
bool CollisionVisibility Collision blocking visibility against complex
bool ColorGrading Color correction after tone mapping
bool CompositeEditorPrimitives Whether to render the editor gizmos and other foreground editor widgets off screen and apply them after post process, only needed for the editor
bool Constraints Render joint limits
bool ContactShadows If Screen space contact shadows are enabled.
bool Cover Complex cover rendering
TBitArray CustomShowFlags NOTE: that the offset of this variable is used mark the end of the variables defined by ShowFlagsValues.inl, no other variables should be added before it.
bool DebugAI Calls debug drawing for AIs
bool DebugDrawDistantVirtualSMLights  
bool Decals Decal rendering, for now SHOWFLAG_ALWAYS_ACCESSIBLE because it's exposed in SceneCapture
bool DeferredLighting Execute the deferred light passes, can be disabled for debugging, for now SHOWFLAG_ALWAYS_ACCESSIBLE because it's exposed in SceneCapture
bool DepthOfField Depth of Field
bool Diffuse Whether to display the scene's diffuse.
bool DirectionalLights Allows to disable lighting from Directional Lights
bool DirectLighting Allows to disable all direct lighting (does not affect indirect light)
bool DisableOcclusionQueries Disable hardware occlusion queries, similar to setting r.AllowOcclusionQueries=0, but just for this scene.
bool DistanceCulledPrimitives Show objects even if they should be distance culled, for now SHOWFLAG_ALWAYS_ACCESSIBLE because it's exposed in SceneCapture
bool DistanceFieldAO Distance field AO, for now SHOWFLAG_ALWAYS_ACCESSIBLE because it's exposed in SceneCapture
bool DynamicShadows Non baked shadows, for now SHOWFLAG_ALWAYS_ACCESSIBLE because it's exposed in SceneCapture
bool EditingLevelInstance Used to determine whether there are any editing LevelInstances to enable the post processing pass
bool Editor Special: Allows to hide objects in the editor, is evaluated per primitive
bool EyeAdaptation Human like eye simulation to adapt to the brightness of the view, for now SHOWFLAG_ALWAYS_ACCESSIBLE because it's exposed in SceneCapture
bool Fog Draws fog, for now SHOWFLAG_ALWAYS_ACCESSIBLE because it's exposed in SceneCapture
bool ForceFeedbackRadius Draw force feedback radii
bool Game If this is a game viewport, needed?
bool GameplayDebug Used by gameplay debugging components to debug-draw on screen
bool GBufferHints Highlight materials that indicate performance issues or show unrealistic materials
bool GlobalIllumination Show indirect lighting component, for now SHOWFLAG_ALWAYS_ACCESSIBLE because it's needed by r.GBuffer
bool Grain Fine film grain
bool Grid To show the grid in editor (grey lines and red dots)
bool Hair If false, hair geometry won't be rendered.
bool HeterogeneousVolumes HeterogeneousVolumes, for now SHOWFLAG_ALWAYS_ACCESSIBLE because it's exposed in SceneCapture
bool HighResScreenshotMask Show the current mask being used by the highres screenshot capture
bool HISMCClusterTree Allow to see the cluster tree bounds used used to generate the occlusion bounds and in the culling
bool HISMCOcclusionBounds Allow to see the foliage bounds used in the occlusion test
bool HitProxies Draws each hit proxy in the scene with a different color, for now only available in the editor
bool HLODColoration Visualize HLOD Coloration
bool HMDDistortion Distortion of output for HMD devices, SHOWFLAG_ALWAYS_ACCESSIBLE for now because USceneCaptureComponent needs that
bool IndirectLightingCache If the indirect lighting cache is enabled, for now SHOWFLAG_ALWAYS_ACCESSIBLE because it's exposed in SceneCapture
bool InputDebugVisualizer Input Debug Visualizer
bool InstancedFoliage Draws instanced foliage, for now SHOWFLAG_ALWAYS_ACCESSIBLE because it's exposed in SceneCapture
bool InstancedGrass Draws instanced grass, for now SHOWFLAG_ALWAYS_ACCESSIBLE because it's exposed in SceneCapture
bool InstancedStaticMeshes Draws instanced static meshes that are not foliage or grass, for now SHOWFLAG_ALWAYS_ACCESSIBLE because it's exposed in SceneCapture
bool Landscape For now SHOWFLAG_ALWAYS_ACCESSIBLE because it's exposed in SceneCapture
bool LargeVertices Displays large clickable icons on static mesh vertices, only needed for the editor
bool LensDistortion Lens distortion (Simulate the distortion of light through the lens onto the filmback)
bool LensFlares Image based lens flares (Simulate artifact of reflections within a camera system)
bool LightComplexity Needed for VMI_LightComplexity
bool LightFunctions LightFunctions (masking light sources with a material), for now SHOWFLAG_ALWAYS_ACCESSIBLE because it's exposed in SceneCapture
bool LightInfluences Draw lines to lights affecting this mesh if its selected.
bool Lighting Show the usual material light interaction
bool LightingOnlyOverride Needed for VMI_LightingOnly, Whether to override material diffuse with constants, used by the Lighting Only viewmode.
bool LightMapDensity Needed for VMI_LightmapDensity and VMI_LitLightmapDensity, render checkerboard material with UVs scaled by lightmap resolution w.
bool LightRadius  
bool LightShafts Render LightShafts, for now SHOWFLAG_ALWAYS_ACCESSIBLE because it's exposed in SceneCapture
bool LocalExposure Local Exposure, for now SHOWFLAG_ALWAYS_ACCESSIBLE because it's exposed in SceneCapture
bool LOD Use LOD parenting, MinDrawDistance, etc. If disabled, will show LOD parenting lines
bool LODColoration Visualize LOD Coloration
bool LumenDetailTraces Use detail tracing in Lumen
bool LumenFarFieldTraces Use far field traces in Lumen
bool LumenGlobalIllumination Lumen GI
bool LumenGlobalTraces Use global traces in Lumen
bool LumenReflections  
bool LumenScreenTraces Use screen space tracing in Lumen
bool LumenSecondaryBounces Compute secondary bounces in Lumen
bool LumenShortRangeAmbientOcclusion Compute screen space directional occlusion in Lumen
bool MassProperties Render mass debug data
bool Materials  
bool MaterialTextureScaleAccuracy Visualize the accuracy of CPU material texture scales when compared to the GPU values
bool MediaPlanes If media planes should be shown
bool MegaLights Whether to display the MegaLights feature, which replaces deferred direct lighting and Ray Traced Shadows with a stochastic sampling and denoising algorithm
bool MeshEdges In the filled view modeModeWidgetss, render mesh edges as well as the filled surfaces.
bool MeshUVDensityAccuracy Visualize the accuracy of the mesh UV density computed for texture streaming
bool ModeWidgets Draws mode specific widgets and controls in the viewports (should only be set on viewport clients that are editing the level itself)
bool MotionBlur MotionBlur, for now only camera motion blur, for now SHOWFLAG_ALWAYS_ACCESSIBLE because it's exposed in SceneCapture
bool NaniteMeshes Draw Nanite meshes
bool NaniteStreamingGeometry Draw Nanite streaming geometry
bool Navigation Whether to draw navigation data
bool Niagara Niagara, for now SHOWFLAG_ALWAYS_ACCESSIBLE because it's exposed in SceneCapture
bool OcclusionMeshes Visualize Occlusion Query bounding meshes
bool OnScreenDebug To allow to disable visualizetexture for some editor rendering (e.g. thumbnail rendering)
bool OpaqueCompositeEditorPrimitives When CompositeEditorPrimitives is set, determines whether occluded portions are drawn opaquely on top, or dithered when they are occluded
bool OutputMaterialTextureScales Outputs the material texture scales.
bool OverrideDiffuseAndSpecular Needed for VMI_Lit_DetailLighting, Whether to override material diffuse and specular with constants, used by the Detail Lighting viewmode.
bool Paper2DSprites Render Paper2D sprites, for now SHOWFLAG_ALWAYS_ACCESSIBLE because it's exposed in SceneCapture
bool Particles Particles, for now SHOWFLAG_ALWAYS_ACCESSIBLE because it's exposed in SceneCapture
bool PathTracing RHI_RAYTRACING begin.
bool PhysicalMaterialMasks Show Physical Material Masks
bool PhysicsField Physics field
bool Pivot For the Editor
bool PointLights Allows to disable lighting from Point Lights, for now SHOWFLAG_ALWAYS_ACCESSIBLE because it's exposed in SceneCapture
bool PostProcessing The default case for SHOWFLAG_FIXED_IN_SHIPPING is to give flag name.
bool PostProcessMaterial Render the PostProcess Material
bool PrecomputedVisibility To disable precomputed visibility
bool PrecomputedVisibilityCells Visualize precomputed visibility cells
bool PreviewShadowsIndicator Visualize preview shadow indicator
bool PrimitiveDistanceAccuracy Visualize the accuracy of the primitive distance computed for texture streaming
bool QuadOverdraw Visualize screen quads
bool RayTracedDistanceFieldShadows If RTDF shadows are enabled.
bool RayTracingDebug  
bool RectLights Allows to disable lighting from Rect Lights, for now SHOWFLAG_ALWAYS_ACCESSIBLE because it's exposed in SceneCapture
bool ReflectionEnvironment Whether to display the Reflection Environment feature, which has local reflections from Reflection Capture actors, for now SHOWFLAG_ALWAYS_ACCESSIBLE because it's exposed in SceneCapture
bool ReflectionOverride Needed for VMI_ReflectionOverride, Whether to override all materials to be smooth, mirror reflections.
bool Refraction Render Post process (screen space) distortion/refraction
bool Rendering Any rendering/buffer clearing (good for benchmarking and for pausing rendering while the app is not in focus to save cycles).
bool RequiredTextureResolution Compare the required texture resolution to the actual resolution.
bool SceneCaptureCopySceneDepth If true, scene depth is copied to the scene capture output depth texture.
bool SceneColorFringe Post processing color fringe (chromatic aberration)
bool ScreenPercentage If Screen Percentage should be applied.
bool ScreenSpaceAO Screen space AO, for now SHOWFLAG_ALWAYS_ACCESSIBLE because r.GBuffer need that
bool ScreenSpaceReflections If screen space reflections are enabled, for now SHOWFLAG_ALWAYS_ACCESSIBLE because it's exposed in SceneCapture
bool Selection Selection rendering, could be useful in game as well
bool SelectionOutline Outline around selected objects in the editor
bool SeparateTranslucency If Translucency should be rendered into a separate RT and composited without DepthOfField, can be disabled in the materials (affects sorting), SHOWFLAG_ALWAYS_ACCESSIBLE for now because USceneCaptureComponent needs that
bool ServerDrawDebug Draw debug rendering from the Dedicated Server during Play In Editor (with Use Dedicated Server checked) in this client viewport
bool ShaderComplexity Needed for VMI_ShaderComplexity, render world colored by shader complexity
bool ShaderComplexityWithQuadOverdraw Visualize the overhead of material quads
bool ShaderPrint Enables ShaderPrint functionality that is used for debug printing from shaders (e.g. 'Nanitestats' command).
bool ShadowFrustums Draws un-occluded shadow frustums in wireframe
bool SkeletalMeshes If SkeletalMeshes are getting rendered, for now SHOWFLAG_ALWAYS_ACCESSIBLE because it's exposed in SceneCapture
bool SkyLighting Contribution from sky light, for now SHOWFLAG_ALWAYS_ACCESSIBLE because it's exposed in SceneCapture
bool Snap To show the snap in editor (only for editor view ports, red dots)
bool Specular Whether to display the scene's specular, including reflections.
bool Splines Spline rendering
bool SpotLights Allows to disable lighting from Spot Lights, for now SHOWFLAG_ALWAYS_ACCESSIBLE because it's exposed in SceneCapture
bool StaticMeshes For now SHOWFLAG_ALWAYS_ACCESSIBLE because it's exposed in SceneCapture
bool StationaryLightOverlap Needed for VMI_StationaryLightOverlap, render world colored by stationary light overlap
bool StereoRendering Whether to render in stereoscopic 3d, for now SHOWFLAG_ALWAYS_ACCESSIBLE because it's used by StereoRendering
bool StreamingBounds Render streaming bounding volumes for the currently selected texture
bool SubsurfaceScattering If Screen Space Subsurface Scattering enabled
bool TemporalAA Only used in AntiAliasing is on, true:uses Temporal AA, otherwise FXAA, for now SHOWFLAG_ALWAYS_ACCESSIBLE because it's exposed in SceneCapture
bool TestImage Shows a test image that allows to tweak the monitor colors, borders and allows to judge image and temporal aliasing
bool TextRender Render TextRenderComponents (3D text), for now SHOWFLAG_ALWAYS_ACCESSIBLE because it's exposed in SceneCapture
bool TexturedLightProfiles LightProfiles, usually 1d textures to have a light (IES), for now SHOWFLAG_ALWAYS_ACCESSIBLE because it's exposed in SceneCapture
bool ToneCurve Post processing filmic tone curve and expand gamut
bool Tonemapper HDR->LDR conversion is done through a tone mapper (otherwise linear mapping is used)
bool Translucency Render translucency, for now SHOWFLAG_ALWAYS_ACCESSIBLE because it's exposed in SceneCapture
bool VectorFields Visualize vector fields.
bool VertexColors Show Vertex Colors
bool Vignette Darkens the screen borders (Camera artifact and artistic effect)
bool VirtualShadowMapPersistentData  
bool VirtualTexturePendingMips Compare the required mip level to the resident virtual texture mip level.
bool VirtualTexturePrimitives Draw in the main pass the primitives that would normally only contribute to runtime virtual textures.
bool VirtualTextureResidency Debug the Virtual Texture System
bool VisLog Calls debug drawing for whatever LogVisualizer wants to draw
bool VisualizeBuffer Needed for VMI_VisualizeBuffer, Whether to enable the buffer visualization mode.
bool VisualizeCalibrationColor Shows a full-screen calibration color post process material defined in renderer config
bool VisualizeCalibrationCustom Shows a full-screen calibration custom post process material defined in renderer config
bool VisualizeCalibrationGrayscale Shows a full-screen calibration grayscale post process material defined in renderer config
bool VisualizeDistanceFieldAO Visualization of distance field AO
bool VisualizeDOF Helper to tweak depth of field
bool VisualizeGlobalDistanceField Global Distance field
bool VisualizeGPUSkinCache Visualize Skin Cache
bool VisualizeGroom Needed for VMI_VisualizeGroom, Whether to enable the Groom visualization mode.
bool VisualizeHDR Display a histogram of the scene HDR color
bool VisualizeInstanceOcclusionQueries Visualize Occlusion Query bounding meshes
bool VisualizeInstanceUpdates Allow to see where each instance is in each ISM Component
bool VisualizeLevelInstanceEditing Grey out actors which do not belong to the currently edited LevelInstance
bool VisualizeLightCulling To visualize the culling in Tile Based Deferred Lighting, later for non tiled as well
bool VisualizeLightFunctionAtlas Enable the light function atlas debug visualization to be drawn on screen
bool VisualizeLightingOnProbes Enable the debug visualization of diffuse/specular lighting (direct and indirect) using probes
bool VisualizeLocalExposure Helper to tweak local expsoure settings
bool VisualizeLumen Needed for VMI_VisualizeLumen, Whether to enable the Lumen visualization mode.
bool VisualizeLWCComplexity  
bool VisualizeMeshDistanceFields Mesh Distance fields
bool VisualizeMotionBlur Helper to tweak motion blur settings
bool VisualizeMotionVectors DEPRECATED in 5.2: Use VisualizeReprojection instead.
bool VisualizeNanite Needed for VMI_VisualizeNanite, Whether to enable the Nanite visualization mode.
bool VisualizeOutOfBoundsPixels Visualize pixels that are outside of their object's bounding box (content error).
bool VisualizePostProcessStack Visualise information about the post processes stacked on screen
bool VisualizeReprojection Helper to ensure previous frame's temporal history reprojections using motion vectors are working correctly.
bool VisualizeSenses Visualize the senses configuration of AIs' PawnSensingComponent
bool VisualizeShadingModels Visualize the Shading Models, mostly or debugging and profiling
bool VisualizeSkyAtmosphere Enable the SkyAtmosphere visualization to be drawn on screen
bool VisualizeSkyLightIlluminance Display the illuminance debug view for the skylight
bool VisualizeSSR Visualize screen space reflections, for developer (by default off):
bool VisualizeSSS If Screen Space Subsurface Scattering visualization is enabled
bool VisualizeSubstrate Needed for VMI_VisualizeSubstrate, Whether to enable the Substrate visualization mode.
bool VisualizeTemporalUpscaler Helper to diagnose temporal upscaler's inputs and outputs.
bool VisualizeTSR Helper to diagnose the internals of TSR.
bool VisualizeVirtualShadowMap Needed for VMI_VisualizeVirtualShadowMap, Whether to enable the virtual shadow map visualization mode.
bool VisualizeVolumetricCloudConservativeDensity Visualize volumetric cloud conservative density.
bool VisualizeVolumetricCloudEmptySpaceSkipping Visualize volumetric cloud density for empty space skipping.
bool VisualizeVolumetricLightmap Visualize volumetric lightmap used for GI on dynamic objects
bool VolumeLightingSamples Visualize volume lighting samples used for GI on dynamic objects
bool Volumes Draws Volumes
bool VolumetricFog SHOWFLAG_ALWAYS_ACCESSIBLE because it's exposed in SceneCapture
bool VolumetricLightmap Whether to apply volumetric lightmap lighting, when present.
bool VREditing If this is a vr editing viewport, needed?
bool WidgetComponents If WidgetComponents should be rendered in the scene
bool Wireframe Needed for VMI_Wireframe and VMI_BrushWireframe

ToString ()

 Not optimized for speed, good for serialization and debugging

Enums

  Type Name Description
ECustomShowFlag Strong type for custom show flag indices starting from 0 to make interface clearer.  
EShowFlag    

Constants

Name Description
OnCustomShowFlagRegistered Delegate fired when a new custom show flag is registered or re-registered so other systems can iterate all show flags and update any related data.

description: ShowFlags are a set of bits (some are fixed in SHIPPING) that are stored in the ViewFamily.
title: FEngineShowFlags
